|stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 3.0, eSATA |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DFS, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEARXX |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, [https://www.voxel-firmware.com/Downloads/Voxel/html/browse.html Voxel] |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/10/2014 |estreldate = 09/03/2014 |estprice = 280 |upc = 606449104110 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC;QT3840BC, AA0IA101, A01468, 1418; |rad1chip2 = Quantenna;QT2518B; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A, NKR892.001B, 1413, TAIWAN; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976484100" appears to be silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Netgear R7500v2|Netgear|Delta Networks}} Note: There are currently multiple '''[https://fccid.io/PY3 FCC ID]'''s which purport to :be for the R7500: [https://fccid.io/PY314100258 PY314100258] and [https://fccid.io/PY314300288 PY314300288]. Per the FCC photos.. *The NAND flash is marked w/ ''4EE17 NW360'' (FBGA code NW360): :[http://www.micron.com/parts/nand-flash/mass-storage/mt29f1g08abbeah4 MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E, 1Gbit SLC NAND] ===Hardware=== According to [http://www.xfastest.com/thread-136419-1-1.html these slides (referenced at the '''SmallNetBuilder''' link below)], :this device is using a dual-core processor running at 1.4 GHz. This would indicate that it is not using [[Broadcom]]'s BCM4709, :but more likely a [[Qualcomm Atheros]] IPQ8064 :([http://www.anandtech.com/show/7526/qualcomm-atheros-announces-new-internet-processor-lineup-ipq8064-and-ipq8062 w/ a noted max. clock of 1.4 GHz, per '''Anandtech''']) :... or perhaps a [[Marvell]] Armada XP/375/385. ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.dailywireless.org/2014/06/16/netgear-readies-4-radio-router/ ''Netgear Readies 4 Radio Router'' on '''DailyWireless'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32445-netgear-ac2350-router-on-the-way ''Netgear AC2350 Router On The Way'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-792-1-1.html ''World premiere, Netgear Netgear R7500 AC2350 wireless router
detailed evaluation of the box, comes teardown map'' on '''KoolShare'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=277961 How to open R7500 and connect the serial header to a Linux computer] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=17812 ''Mediatrek'''s thread (''NETGEAR R7500 Nighthawk X4 AC2350 Router'')
on the '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] :[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showpost.php?p=137946&postcount=40 Internal images on '''KoolShare'''] :[http://us.winbond-usa.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/SpecialtyDRAM/DDR3SDRAM/ DDR3 SDRAM on '''Winbond'''] *[http://www.chiphell.com/thread-1104278-1-1.html ''Netgear R7500'' on '''ChipHell'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32518-netgear-r7500-nighthawk-x4-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''Tim Higgins'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/178-netgear-r7500.html Review on '''FoxNetwork'''] *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-r7500.shtml Review on '''iXBT.com'''] (RU) *[http://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r7500-nighthawk-x4/ Review on '''OpenITForum'''] (PL) *[http://missingremote.com/review/netgear-r7500-nighthawk-x4-smart-wifi-ac2350-router ''Andrew Van Til's'' review on '''Missing Remote'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_r7500_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/r7500 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_5ghz WiFi 5GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
